name: Water's Origin
loreDescription: Wherever this talisman is, I will be too. To bring safety from storms, freedom from illness, life where once there was only ruin.

skillDescription.base: If damage taken exceeds 20% of max Health, recovers 8% Health and increases Combat Readiness by 10.0%.
skillDescription.max: If damage taken exceeds 20% of max Health, recovers 8% Health and increases Combat Readiness by 20.0%.
